name: Designer Noise
description:
[Designer Noise] is a presentation theme optimized for Keynote and PowerPoint. It is a stylish addition to the Natique designer presentation theme collection with its cool color palette and clean lines.

This presentation theme package comes with full customization, 17 designer master slides, and 2 special photo slide features to showcase your visual elements. 

- - - - - - - - - - - 

Once the payment transection via PayPal is done, you will receive a secure download link to a .zip file including both the [Designer Noise] Keynote theme and PowerPoint template. This 2-in-1 package allows you to give stylish presentations on both Microsoft Office and iWork.  

- - - - - - - - - - -

Natique's collection of designer Keynote and Powerpoint themes focuses on offering a sophisticated and stylish aesthetic at an unparalleled price of US$2 each.
